con:part.con:content: <wsdl:definitions name="AddressEBS" targetNamespace="http://www.estafet.com/enterprise/services/address/v1" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/" xmlns:ebs="http://www.estafet.com/enterprise/services/address/v1" xmlns:ebm="http://www.estafet.com/enterprise/messages/address/v1"> <wsdl:documentation>Address Enterprise Business Service</wsdl:documentation> <wsdl:types> <xsd:schema elementFormDefault="qualified" targetNamespace="http://www.estafet.com/enterprise/services/address/v1"> <xsd:import namespace="http://www.estafet.com/enterprise/messages/address/v1" schemaLocation="http://localhost:9200/cxf/postaladdressvalidator?xsd=../../../messages/address/v1/AddressEBM.xsd"/> </xsd:schema> </wsdl:types> <wsdl:message name="FormatAddressRespMsg"> <wsdl:part element="ebm:FormatAddressResponseEBM" name="FormatAddressResponseEBM"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="ProcessAddressReqMsg"> <wsdl:part element="ebm:ProcessAddressEBM" name="ProcessAddressEBM"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="ProcessAddressRespMsg"> <wsdl:part element="ebm:ProcessAddressResponseEBM" name="ProcessAddressResponseEBM"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="FormatAddressReqMsg"> <wsdl:part element="ebm:FormatAddressEBM" name="FormatAddressEBM"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="SearchAddressRespMsg"> <wsdl:part element="ebm:SearchAddressResponseEBM" name="SearchAddressResponseEBM"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="ProcessAddressesRespMsg"> <wsdl:part element="ebm:ProcessAddressesResponseEBM" name="ProcessAddressesResponseEBM"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="SearchAddressReqMsg"> <wsdl:part element="ebm:SearchAddressEBM" name="SearchAddressEBM"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="ProcessAddressesReqMsg"> <wsdl:part element="ebm:ProcessAddressesEBM" name="ProcessAddressesEBM"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:portType name="AddressEBS"> <wsdl:operation name="FormatAddress"> <wsdl:input message="ebs:FormatAddressReqMsg"></wsdl:input> <wsdl:output message="ebs:FormatAddressRespMsg"></wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="SearchAddress"> <wsdl:input message="ebs:SearchAddressReqMsg"></wsdl:input> <wsdl:output message="ebs:SearchAddressRespMsg"></wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="ProcessAddress"> <wsdl:input message="ebs:ProcessAddressReqMsg"></wsdl:input> <wsdl:output message="ebs:ProcessAddressRespMsg"></wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="ProcessAddresses"> <wsdl:input message="ebs:ProcessAddressesReqMsg"></wsdl:input> <wsdl:output message="ebs:ProcessAddressesRespMsg"></wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:portType> <wsdl:binding name="AddressEBSSOAP" type="ebs:AddressEBS"> <soap:binding style="document" transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"/> <wsdl:operation name="FormatAddress"> <soap:operation soapAction="http://www.estafet.com/enterprise/services/address/v1/FormatAddress"/> <wsdl:input> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="SearchAddress"> <soap:operation soapAction="http://www.estafet.com/enterprise/services/address/v1/SearchAddress"/> <wsdl:input> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="ProcessAddress"> <soap:operation soapAction="http://www.estafet.com/enterprise/services/address/v1/ProcessAddress"/> <wsdl:input> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="ProcessAddresses"> <soap:operation soapAction="http://www.estafet.com/enterprise/services/address/v1/ProcessAddresses"/> <wsdl:input> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:binding> <wsdl:service name="AddressEBS"> <wsdl:port binding="ebs:AddressEBSSOAP" name="AddressEBSSOAP"> <soap:address location="http://localhost:9200/cxf/postaladdressvalidator"/> </wsdl:port> </wsdl:service> </wsdl:definitions>

<!--** estafet ** ** Canonical Model ** ** Version 1.0 ** ** Author James Glass ** Date: 20 May 2015 **--> <xsd:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" targetNamespace="http://www.estafet.com/enterprise/messages/address/v1" version="1.0" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:ebo="http://www.estafet.com/enterprise/objects/address/v1" xmlns="http://www.estafet.com/enterprise/messages/address/v1"> <!--======================================================================--> <!--============== Imports and Includes ===============================--> <!--======================================================================--> <xsd:import namespace="http://www.estafet.com/enterprise/objects/address/v1" schemaLocation="http://localhost:9200/cxf/postaladdressvalidator?xsd=../../../objects/address/v1/AddressEBO.xsd"/> <!--======================================================================--> <!--================== Format Address ====================================--> <!--======================================================================--> <xsd:complexType name="FormatAddressEBMType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="DataArea" type="FormatAddressDataAreaType"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="FormatAddressEBM" type="FormatAddressEBMType"/> <xsd:complexType name="FormatAddressDataAreaType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="FormatAddress"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="FormatAddressType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="User" type="ebo:UserType"/> <xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Options" type="ebo:COptimaOptionSet"/> <xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="AddressPostal" type="ebo:AddressPostalType"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="FormatAddress" type="FormatAddressType"/> <!--=======================================================================--> <!--================= Format Address Response =============================--> <!--=======================================================================--> <xsd:complexType name="FormatAddressResponseEBMType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="DataArea" type="FormatAddressResponseDataAreaType"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="FormatAddressResponseEBM" type="FormatAddressResponseEBMType"/> <xsd:complexType name="FormatAddressResponseDataAreaType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="FormatAddressResponse"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="FormatAddressResponseType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="Result" type="xsd:boolean"/> <xsd:element name="AddressPostal" type="ebo:AddressPostalType"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="FormatAddressResponse" type="FormatAddressResponseType"/> <!--======================================================================--> <!--================== Search Address ====================================--> <!--======================================================================--> <xsd:complexType name="SearchAddressEBMType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="DataArea" type="SearchAddressDataAreaType"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="SearchAddressEBM" type="SearchAddressEBMType"/> <xsd:complexType name="SearchAddressDataAreaType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="SearchAddress"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="MaxResultsType"> <xsd:simpleContent> <xsd:extension base="xsd:int"> <xsd:attribute default="0" name="verbose" type="xsd:int"></xsd:attribute> </xsd:extension> </xsd:simpleContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="SearchAddressType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="User" type="ebo:UserType"/> <xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Key" type="ebo:KeyType"/> <xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="AddressPostal" type="ebo:AddressPostalType"/> <xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="MaxResults" type="MaxResultsType"/> <xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Options" type="ebo:COptimaOptionSet"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="SearchAddress" type="SearchAddressType"/> <!--======================================================================--> <!--================== Search Address Response ===========================--> <!--======================================================================--> <xsd:complexType name="SearchAddressResponseEBMType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="DataArea" type="SearchAddressResponseDataAreaType"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="SearchAddressResponseEBM" type="SearchAddressResponseEBMType"/> <xsd:complexType name="SearchAddressResponseDataAreaType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="SearchAddressResponse"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="SearchAddressResponseType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="AddressPostal" type="ebo:AddressPostalType"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="SearchAddressResponse" type="SearchAddressResponseType"/> <!--======================================================================--> <!--================== Process Address ===================================--> <!--======================================================================--> <xsd:complexType name="ProcessAddressEBMType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="DataArea" type="ProcessAddressDataAreaType"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="ProcessAddressEBM" type="ProcessAddressEBMType"/> <xsd:complexType name="ProcessAddressDataAreaType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="ProcessAddress"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="ProcessAddressType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="User" type="ebo:UserType"/> <xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Key" type="ebo:KeyType"/> <xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="EnhancementDatasetName" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Options" type="ebo:COptimaOptionSet"/> <xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="AddressPostal" type="ebo:AddressPostalType"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="ProcessAddress" type="ProcessAddressType"/> <!--======================================================================--> <!--================== Process Address Response ==========================--> <!--======================================================================--> <xsd:complexType name="ProcessAddressResponseEBMType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="DataArea" type="ProcessAddressResponseDataAreaType"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="ProcessAddressResponseEBM" type="ProcessAddressResponseEBMType"/> <xsd:complexType name="ProcessAddressResponseDataAreaType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="ProcessAddressResponse"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="ProcessAddressResponseType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="Result" type="xsd:boolean"/> <xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="AddressPostal" type="ebo:AddressPostalType"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="ProcessAddressResponse" type="ProcessAddressResponseType"/> <!--======================================================================--> <!--================== Process Addresses =================================--> <!--======================================================================--> <xsd:complexType name="ProcessAddressesEBMType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="DataArea" type="ProcessAddressesDataAreaType"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="ProcessAddressesEBM" type="ProcessAddressesEBMType"/> <xsd:complexType name="ProcessAddressesDataAreaType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="ProcessAddresses"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="ProcessAddressesType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="User" type="ebo:UserType"/> <xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="EnhancementDatasetName" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Options" type="ebo:COptimaOptionSet"/> <xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="1" name="AddressPostal" type="ebo:AddressPostalType"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="ProcessAddresses" type="ProcessAddressesType"/> <!--======================================================================--> <!--================== Process Addresses Response ========================--> <!--======================================================================--> <xsd:complexType name="ProcessAddressesResponseEBMType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="DataArea" type="ProcessAddressesResponseDataAreaType"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="ProcessAddressesResponseEBM" type="ProcessAddressesResponseEBMType"/> <xsd:complexType name="ProcessAddressesResponseDataAreaType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="ProcessAddressesResponse"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="ProcessAddressesResponseType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="Result" type="xsd:boolean"/> <xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="AddressPostal" type="ebo:AddressPostalType"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="ProcessAddressesResponse" type="ProcessAddressesResponseType"/> </xsd:schema>

<!--** estafet ** ** Canonical Model ** ** Version 1.0 ** ** Author James Glass ** Date: 20 May 2015 **--> <xsd:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" targetNamespace="http://www.estafet.com/enterprise/objects/address/v1" version="1.0" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns="http://www.estafet.com/enterprise/objects/address/v1"> <xsd:element name="Address" type="AddressType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Main postal and electronic Address info</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:complexType name="AddressType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="AddressPostal" type="AddressPostalType"/> <xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="AddressElectronic" type="AddressElectronicType"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="AddressPostalType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="AddressLine1" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="AddressLine2" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="AddressLine3" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="AddressLine4" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="AddressLine5" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="AddressLine6" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="AddressLine7" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="AddressLine8" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Company" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Building" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="SubBuilding" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Department" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Premise" type="ComponentType"/> <xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Street" type="ComponentType"/> <xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="SubStreet" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="POBox" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="City" type="ComponentType"/> <xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="SubCity" type="ComponentType"/> <xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Principality" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Region" type="ComponentType"/> <xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Postcode" type="ComponentType"/> <xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="DPS" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Cedex" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Country" type="ComponentType"/> <xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="CountryISO" type="CountryISOType"/> <xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Latitude" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Longitude" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="ProviderName" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="ProviderType" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:group ref="QualityGroup"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="ComponentType"> <xsd:simpleContent> <xsd:extension base="xsd:string"> <xsd:attribute name="status" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:attribute name="level" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:attribute name="desc" type="xsd:string"/> </xsd:extension> </xsd:simpleContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="CountryISOType"> <xsd:simpleContent> <xsd:extension base="xsd:string"> <xsd:attribute name="iso3" type="xsd:string"/> </xsd:extension> </xsd:simpleContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:group name="QualityGroup"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Quality" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Match" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="SupplierQuality" type="xsd:string"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:group> <xsd:complexType name="AddressElectronicType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Value" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Type" type="StyleType"/> <xsd:group ref="QualityGroup"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:simpleType name="StyleType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="email"/> <xsd:enumeration value="url"/> <xsd:enumeration value="ip"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="KeyType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"/> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="UserType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:minLength value="3"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:complexType name="COptimaOptionSet"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="OptionsMain" type="ArrayOfCOptimaOption"/> <xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="OptionsMask" type="ArrayOfCOptimaOptionMasks"/> <xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="OptionsOther" type="ArrayOfCOptimaOptionOther"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="ArrayOfCOptimaOption"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="COptimaOption" nillable="true" type="COptimaOption"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="COptimaOption"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="OptionName" type="OON"/> <xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="OptionValue" type="xsd:int"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:simpleType name="OON"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="SalutationLanguage"/> <xsd:enumeration value="CountryLanguage"/> <xsd:enumeration value="OverrideSalutationLanguage"/> <xsd:enumeration value="NameCasing"/> <xsd:enumeration value="AddressCasing"/> <xsd:enumeration value="TelephoneCasing"/> <xsd:enumeration value="NameWordCheck"/> <xsd:enumeration value="AddressWordCheck"/> <xsd:enumeration value="TelephoneWordCheck"/> <xsd:enumeration value="ForceUpdate1"/> <xsd:enumeration value="ForceUpdate2"/> <xsd:enumeration value="ForceUpdate3"/> <xsd:enumeration value="Deprecated1"/> <xsd:enumeration value="NameFlagBadWord"/> <xsd:enumeration value="AddressFlagBadWord"/> <xsd:enumeration value="TelephoneFlagBadWord"/> <xsd:enumeration value="Deprecated2"/> <xsd:enumeration value="CautiousUpdate"/> <xsd:enumeration value="EnforceBlanks"/> <xsd:enumeration value="DedupeCommonErrors"/> <xsd:enumeration value="FormatComponents1"/> <xsd:enumeration value="FormatComponents2"/> <xsd:enumeration value="FormatComponents3"/> <xsd:enumeration value="StandardiseComponents1"/> <xsd:enumeration value="StandardiseComponents2"/> <xsd:enumeration value="StandardiseComponents3"/> <xsd:enumeration value="ValidateComponents1"/> <xsd:enumeration value="ValidateComponents2"/> <xsd:enumeration value="ValidateComponents3"/> <xsd:enumeration value="CompanyWeight"/> <xsd:enumeration value="StreetWeight"/> <xsd:enumeration value="CityWeight"/> <xsd:enumeration value="PostcodeWeight"/> <xsd:enumeration value="ShuffleLines"/> <xsd:enumeration value="ConcatenationLines"/> <xsd:enumeration value="OuterMatchscoreLines"/> <xsd:enumeration value="CarryStandardisationChanges"/> <xsd:enumeration value="ApplyReferenceAccents"/> <xsd:enumeration value="ReturnUserData"/> <xsd:enumeration value="SearchTimeout"/> <xsd:enumeration value="ReplaceAlias1"/> <xsd:enumeration value="ReplaceAlias2"/> <xsd:enumeration value="ReplaceAlias3"/> <xsd:enumeration value="ValidatedDataOnly"/> <xsd:enumeration value="StandardisationDebugOutput"/> <xsd:enumeration value="FormatSearchResults"/> <xsd:enumeration value="CompareField1"/> <xsd:enumeration value="CompareField2"/> <xsd:enumeration value="CompareField3"/> <xsd:enumeration value="AlwaysShow1"/> <xsd:enumeration value="AlwaysShow2"/> <xsd:enumeration value="AlwaysShow3"/> <xsd:enumeration value="StandardiseComponents"/> <xsd:enumeration value="RemoveNumerics"/> <xsd:enumeration value="GeocodeSearchResults"/> <xsd:enumeration value="Transliteration"/> <xsd:enumeration value="StrictSelect"/> <xsd:enumeration value="PhoneticAliasMatch"/> <xsd:enumeration value="IgnoreEOLs"/> <xsd:enumeration value="ReturnPremiseRanges"/> <xsd:enumeration value="ConcatenateValidationRules"/> <xsd:enumeration value="AddressValidationRuleOFT"/> <xsd:enumeration value="EnhanceValidationRuleOFT"/> <xsd:enumeration value="ExhaustiveValidation"/> <xsd:enumeration value="ExhaustiveEnhancement"/> <xsd:enumeration value="ExhaustiveSearchAddress"/> <xsd:enumeration value="BusinessFlagSearchResults"/> <xsd:enumeration value="EnhancedDataOnly"/> <xsd:enumeration value="NumOptionsPlusOne"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:complexType name="ArrayOfCOptimaOptionMasks"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="COptimaOptionMasks" nillable="true" type="COptimaOptionMasks"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="COptimaOptionMasks"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="OptionName" type="OON"/> <xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="FieldName" type="OFT"/> <xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="OptionValue" type="xsd:boolean"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:simpleType name="OFT"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="RecordID"/> <xsd:enumeration value="Title"/> <xsd:enumeration value="FirstName"/> <xsd:enumeration value="MiddleInitials"/> <xsd:enumeration value="LastName"/> <xsd:enumeration value="FullName"/> <xsd:enumeration value="NameSuffix"/> <xsd:enumeration value="Gender"/> <xsd:enumeration value="JobTitle"/> <xsd:enumeration value="Salutation"/> <xsd:enumeration value="Department"/> <xsd:enumeration value="Company"/> <xsd:enumeration value="Building"/> <xsd:enumeration value="SubBuilding"/> <xsd:enumeration value="Premise"/> <xsd:enumeration value="Street"/> <xsd:enumeration value="SubStreet"/> <xsd:enumeration value="POBox"/> <xsd:enumeration value="SubCity"/> <xsd:enumeration value="City"/> <xsd:enumeration value="Region"/> <xsd:enumeration value="Principality"/> <xsd:enumeration value="Postcode"/> <xsd:enumeration value="Country"/> <xsd:enumeration value="DPS"/> <xsd:enumeration value="Cedex"/> <xsd:enumeration value="MKN"/> <xsd:enumeration value="MKA"/> <xsd:enumeration value="MKC"/> <xsd:enumeration value="ACR"/> <xsd:enumeration value="WCR"/> <xsd:enumeration value="NCR"/> <xsd:enumeration value="TCR"/> <xsd:enumeration value="ECR"/> <xsd:enumeration value="Percent"/> <xsd:enumeration value="Duplicate"/> <xsd:enumeration value="DUPmaster"/> <xsd:enumeration value="DUPconfidence"/> <xsd:enumeration value="Other1"/> <xsd:enumeration value="Other2"/> <xsd:enumeration value="Other3"/> <xsd:enumeration value="Other4"/> <xsd:enumeration value="Other5"/> <xsd:enumeration value="Other6"/> <xsd:enumeration value="Other7"/> <xsd:enumeration value="Other8"/> <xsd:enumeration value="Other9"/> <xsd:enumeration value="Other10"/> <xsd:enumeration value="AddressLine1"/> <xsd:enumeration value="AddressLine2"/> <xsd:enumeration value="AddressLine3"/> <xsd:enumeration value="AddressLine4"/> <xsd:enumeration value="AddressLine5"/> <xsd:enumeration value="AddressLine6"/> <xsd:enumeration value="AddressLine7"/> <xsd:enumeration value="AddressLine8"/> <xsd:enumeration value="CountryISO"/> <xsd:enumeration value="MobileTelephone"/> <xsd:enumeration value="Telephone1"/> <xsd:enumeration value="Telephone2"/> <xsd:enumeration value="Telephone3"/> <xsd:enumeration value="Telephone4"/> <xsd:enumeration value="Email1"/> <xsd:enumeration value="Email2"/> <xsd:enumeration value="URL1"/> <xsd:enumeration value="URL2"/> <xsd:enumeration value="NumFieldsPlusOne"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:complexType name="ArrayOfCOptimaOptionOther"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="COptimaOptionOther" nillable="true" type="COptimaOptionOther"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="COptimaOptionOther"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="OptionName" type="OtherOptions"/> <xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="OptionValue" type="xsd:string"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:simpleType name="OtherOptions"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="DefaultCountry"/> <xsd:enumeration value="FormatSelectResults"/> <xsd:enumeration value="GeocodeSelectResults"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:complexType name="ExcludeType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="1" name="Exclude" nillable="true" type="OFT"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:schema>
